text: Hinrich Lehmann-Grube (21 December 1932 - 6 August 2017) was a German politician. He served as Mayor of Leipzig from 1990 through 1998. He was a member of the Social Democratic Party of Germany. He was born in Königsberg (present day Kaliningrad, Russia). Lehmann-Grube died in Leipzig of cancer on 6 August 2017 at the age of 84. ==References== ==Other websites== * Hinrich Lehmann-Grube im Leipzig-Lexikon * Dr. Hinrich Lehmann-Grube, Sachsen (Leipzig), zeitzeugenbuero.de * Ralf Geißler: Ein Neubeginn in Leipzig: Hinrich Lehmann-Grube: vom BRD- zum DDR-Politiker, Sendemanuskript, Deutschlandradio Kultur, 06. title: Hinrich Lehmann-Grube
